definition.en: The amount of work expected of students taking the course, often provided as a figure per week or per month, and may be broken down by type. For example, “2 hours of lectures, 1 hour of lab work and 3 hours of independent study per week”.
definition.de: The amount of work expected of students taking the course, often provided as a figure per week or per month, and may be broken down by type. For example, “2 hours of lectures, 1 hour of lab work and 3 hours of independent study per week”.

definition.es: The amount of work expected of students taking the course, often provided as a figure per week or per month, and may be broken down by type. For example, “2 hours of lectures, 1 hour of lab work and 3 hours of independent study per week”.

title.en: ActivityPub and friends – An ontology of the fediverse
